ygData.subject: Re: Memmed spells
ygData.msgSnippet: That s not true. Divine lasts 30 seconds, and is ALOT faster to cast and takes only 10 mana. It has saved my butt alot of times in unrest and several other
ygData.messageBody:
That's not true. Divine lasts 30 seconds, and is ALOT faster to cast and
takes only 10 mana. It has saved my butt alot of times in unrest and several
other places where things didn't quiet go the way we wanted.
I would recommend that ever cleric mems Divine all the time. The first time
you use it, it'll prove itself. I can't wait to get the next Divine spell.

Levo, Bertox
----- Original Message -----
From: Jake <Kimmers@...>
To: <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, June 24, 1999 7:35 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] Memmed spells


> From: Jake <Kimmers@...>
>
> Divine ain't that good guys. It might save you once or twice, but It lasts
for
> about 5 seconds and runs off. I think Gate would be better. Just root the
thing
> and Gate out of there. I would do that. But if u are good in the first
place u
> won't need any of em. hehe :)
>
> "Mr. J Daniels" wrote:
>
> > From: "Mr. J Daniels" <warpig@...>
> >
> > I"m not sure what level you are but gate is not good for safety unless
you
> > are low level or you are high level fighting greens. When you get to
> > the mid 20's and start fighting stuff that hits you for mega damage gate
> > will not work. Divine is the way to go. Now a divine and then gate
> > when the divine wears off will work..(that is if you are grouped) most
> > mosnters will move off you when you divine..
> >
> > Mr. J Daniels
> >
> > On Tue, 22 Jun 1999, Jeff wrote:
> >
> > > From: "Jeff" <jeffh@...>
> > >
> > > > Wow, no divine aura - brave guy.
> > > >
> > >
> > > Its not so much the, lack of divine aura that I find brave. Its the
fact
> > > that there is also no gate. Only one is needed to get you out of
trouble.
> > >
